mapper.select: SELECT a.brand_no, a.brand_nm, b.brand_no AS p_brand_no, b.brand_nm AS p_brand_nm, a.use_yn FROM tb_brand_type a INNER JOIN tb_brand_type b ON a.p_brand_no = b.brand_no WHERE a.p_brand_no = #{p_brand_no} ORDER BY a.brand_no

SELECT a.brand_no, a.brand_nm, b.brand_no AS p_brand_no, b.brand_nm AS p_brand_nm, a.use_yn FROM tb_brand_type a INNER JOIN tb_brand_type b ON a.p_brand_no = b.brand_no WHERE a.p_brand_no IN (SELECT brand_no FROM tb_brand_type WHERE p_brand_no = 1) ORDER BY a.brand_no
SELECT craft_no, craft_nm, use_yn FROM tb_craft_type ORDER BY craft_no
SELECT a.brand_no, a.brand_nm, b.brand_no AS p_brand_no, b.brand_nm AS p_brand_nm, a.use_yn FROM tb_brand_type a INNER JOIN tb_brand_type b ON a.p_brand_no = b.brand_no WHERE a.brand_no = #{brand_no}

SELECT a.category_no, a.category_nm, b.brand_no, b.brand_nm, c.brand_no AS p_brand_no, c.brand_nm AS p_brand_nm, d.craft_no, d.craft_nm, a.use_yn FROM tb_product_category a INNER JOIN tb_brand_type b ON a.brand_no = b.brand_no INNER JOIN tb_brand_type c ON b.p_brand_no = c.brand_no INNER JOIN tb_craft_type d ON a.craft_no = d.craft_no ORDER BY b.p_brand_no, a.brand_no, a.craft_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_category(craft_no, brand_no, category_nm) VALUES(#{craft_no}, #{brand_no}, #{category_nm})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_brand_type SET use_yn = IFNULL(#{use_yn},'N') WHERE brand_no = #{brand_no}
UPDATE tb_craft_type SET use_yn = IFNULL(#{use_yn},'N') WHERE craft_no = #{craft_no}
UPDATE tb_product_category SET use_yn = IFNULL(#{use_yn},'N') WHERE craft_no = #{craft_no}
